ModMetaData.name: GrimWorld 40,000 - Imperial Vehicles of Grimworld
ModMetaData.author: Clashgore, Odzmang, BlackMarket420, Tittymcswaggy, Alite, Abomination, Epsilon, Maxim, Shun The Witch, Samael, Con
ModMetaData.description: The Imperium of Man is composed of several different military forces, from the basic infantrymen of the Imperial Guard to the massive Titans and starships that represent the most potent manifestations of the Emperor of Mankind's might. These armed forces each have their own specific vehicles, but they also field several vehicles common to more than one branch, such as the Rhino. These separate armed forces are represented by different armies, and the organisation of this list reflects this reality. The armed forces of the Imperium include, but are not limited to, the Space Marines, the Astra Militarum, the Adeptus Mechanicus including the Titan Legions, the Inquisition, the Imperial Knights, the Adeptus Arbites and the Orders Militant of the Adepta Sororitas.
